resources.string: Beta sign up for credit card
Make international transactions on Google Play store, App store, Airbnb, Netflix and more
No annual fee, No late fee, No hidden fee
We analyze your transactional and promotional SMS, Facebook and Linkedin profiles to issue you a Credit Card. Kindly go through the steps below to give us required access:
Login with Facebook and allow permissions for friend list, email and public profile
Kindly login again with all permissions
Kindly provide sms permissions from app settings
Login with LinkedIn to give us your work history
Allow us to read your promotional and transactional messages
